name: Nancy Ward
offering: Financial Coaches, Online Course Creation, Powerpoint Slide Creation
what_you_do: Nancy Ward provides financial coaching services to help people take control of their money and create systems that fit their real life.
who_you_serve: Individuals, including those with small businesses or side income, who need support managing their day-to-day finances, paying off debt, and reducing financial stress.
social_proof: Over 30 years of entrepreneurial experience, client testimonials
business_focus: Providing financial coaching and support to help individuals and small business owners improve their money management and achieve their financial goals.
service_provided: Financial coaching, debt management, cash flow analysis
